info.name: KemaTelyu API
info.description:
RESTful API for the **Sistem Eâ€‘Ticketing dan Sertifikasi Digital KemaTelyu**.
Uses JWT bearer authentication. All secured endpoints require
`Authorization: Bearer <token>` header.
